content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Ms. Müller, I'm glad you found the apartment to your liking. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is in the city center, and the current market price for similar apartments is around 800 euros. I can offer you a special price of 750 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Ms. Müller, but 750 euros per month is too low for such a prime location. I am looking for a more substantial offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Let's say 780 euros per month. It's a good price for a newly built apartment in the city center.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 780 euros is still not enough. A top-quality apartment like this should fetch a higher price. I'm sure you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: All right, I can offer you 790 euros per month. It's the lowest I can go considering the facilities and the location of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I see. 790 euros is still not enough. This apartment is in high demand, and I'm sure someone will offer more than that. Let's continue negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Let's say 800 euros per month. It's the lowest I can go considering the facilities and the location of the apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 800 euros is a little better, but I still believe this apartment is worth more. Let's try to find a price that reflects its true value.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can see that you are a tough negotiator. Let's say 810 euros per month. It's my final offer. I can't go any lower.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 810 euros per month is more like it. I appreciate your persistence in negotiations. I accept your offer of 810 euros per month. I agree to the price of 810 euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Congratulations, Ms. Müller! You have successfully rented the apartment at the price of 810 euros per month. I hope you will enjoy your stay at our apartment. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
